name: pwssb
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1
body: |- wb(wss(c0, cpw(c1)), wral(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), c1)))

stmt.origin: bitri(wss(c0, cpw(c1)), wral(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), c1)), wss(cuni(c0), c1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wss(c0, cpw(c1)), wral(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), c1)))
-| wb(wss(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(cuni(c0), c1))
-| wb(wss(cuni(c0), c1), wral(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wss(c0, cpw(c1)), wral(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), c1)))
-| wb(wss(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(cuni(c0), c1))
-| wb(wss(cuni(c0), c1), wral(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), c1)))

|- wb(wss(c0, cpw(c1)), wral(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), c1)))
-| wb(wss(cuni(c0), c1), wral(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), c1)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wss(cuni(c0), c1), wral(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), c1)))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wss(c0, cpw(c1)), wral(s0, c0, wss(cv(s0), c1)))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

comment: Two ways to express a collection of subclasses. (Contributed by NM, 19-Jul-2006.)
